Description:
DUAL LIVING WITH DISTINCTION
Presenting this unique and highly sought-after opportunity to acquire A SENSATIONAL FAMILY HOME WITH MULTIPLE LIVING OPTIONS all under the one roof! Poised on a manicured 1,016 sqm (approx.) block, the property, while not suitable for subdivision, has been re-imagined to allow multiple generations to live together, whilst maintaining their privacy and independence.
The original residence has been beautifully brought into the 21st century, whilst still retaining some of its charming original elements. Wonderfully warm and welcoming, it features an inviting front lounge with open fireplace complemented by a bright, open family and meals area which overlooks the spacious garden and leads to an alfresco area with integrated barbeque. Inspiring social interaction, the bespoke kitchen takes center stage, containing quality appliances, an abundance of soft close cabinetry and an expansive island all topped with polished granite benchtops. Three bedrooms boast built-in wardrobes and ceiling fans while a designated study with a built-in desk and shelving, provides additional flexible storage space.
The stylish and functional floor-to-ceiling tiled bathroom features a shower over bath, floating vanity and concealed toiletry cabinet. A well-designed laundry incorporates a butlers pantry and accesses a second toilet.
The residence, as well as being fully renovated, has been extended to include a striking pitched roof third living area, two extra bedrooms with walk-in wardrobes, two bathrooms, another study, plus access onto its own private courtyard area with side vegetable garden and shed. The dwelling benefits from lower running costs due to many double glazed windows, solar power and water tank. Gas ducted heating and air conditioning is provided for comfortable year-round living.
Outside, the stunning vine-wrapped arbor is flanked by a large child/pet friendly backyard with play and fire pit area.
Plenty of storage is available in the expansive tandem garage that could be utilized for workshop, recreation or home-based business purposes, in addition, the property has an abundance of off-street parking.
Peaceful, private and convenient, the property can be relished from a supremely central location.
Reaching buses, the Tarralla Creek Trail, Tinternvale Primary School, Eastfield shops and eateries on foot.
Only minutes from Tintern Grammar, Croydon and Ringwood East shops and train stations.
